name: Nihilego GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Empty Light
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may leave both Active Pokémon Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Lock Up
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Symbiont GX
attacks.effect: Add the top 2 cards of your opponent’s deck to their Prize cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
